item.title: Product Owner Services
item.description: Experienced (12 years) product owner for software systems. I am experienced in software products like webapps, and iPad apps including the necessary back-end services and company system integrations. I have specialized in e-Commerce applications in the renewable energy sector, but I learn domain knowledge quickly. Fluent in English and Dutch, I will actively seek for improved solutions for challenges and opportunities of and with the stake holders. Core Expertise Applying the scrum agile framework as a product owner with internal and external teams.
